boardgame.name: Wings of War: Dawn of War
Wings of War: The Dawn of World War II
Крылья войны. Зарево Второй мировой
boardgame.description: 1939. The German war machine starts steamrolling over Europe. Earth and sky are aflame with battles. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s the dawn of the largest war fought by mankind, and supremacy in the air can mean victory or defeat._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The WW2 series of Wings of War is an easy, fun to play, fast and furious system which previous fans of the game will be able to start playing minutes after opening the box! New game mechanics support a simulation which must encompass planes with very different flight capabilities and firepower, while still keeping the flow of the combat simple as it is in the WW1 series. The innovations to maneuver cards and to the fire deck system provide all the needed historical accuracy with no headaches to the players!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;Dawn of War_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; is the first set in the new series of Wings of War games, which will allow you to re-create dogfights, bombing missions, escorts, and endless other aerial combat situations set in World War Two. Including fighter planes from the first years (1939-1941) of the war, but also used later in the conflict, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;Dawn of War_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; provides the foundation for a new, exciting evolution of the Wings of War system. Pilot a Spitfire, a Messerschmitt, a Hurricane, a Wildcat, a Zero... Up to 6 planes can fly with the contents of this set, for scenarios with 2 to 6 players._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Part of the Wings of War series_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Re-Implemented by:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Wings of War: WW2 Deluxe set_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Wings of War: WW2 Airplane Packs_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Wings of Glory: WW2 Starter Set_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: The game is new and still in shrink Shipping to France : 7 euros Shipping to Europa : 9 euros Shipping to rest of the World : 13 euros

Fantasy Flight Games (FFG WW06) World War I was the age of the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;knights of the air._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Aircraft were new, and their role as a weapon of war just being invented. By World War II, the machines were much more sophisticated, and much more critical to the plans of an ground commanders than ever before. World War II was a new age of aviation and a new age of warfare – and now, Wings of War goes to the beginning of this new epoch. This is The Dawn of World War II. Now Wings of War has expanded to include the flying machines and battles of World War II with Wings of War: The Dawn of World War II! The WWII series of Wings of War is an easy, fun to play, fast and furious system which fans of Famous Aces and the rest of the Wings of War games will be able to start playing minutes after opening the box! Wings of War: The Dawn of World War II includes fighter planes from the first years (1939-1941) of the war – pilot a Spitfire, a Messerschmitt, a Hurricane. Outfight, outthink, and outfly your opponents with the innovative and viscerally satisfying Wings of War maneuver system. Up to 6 planes can fly with the contents of this set.

My late husband was an avid board game collector. It is time for the games to find new homes, hopefully to someone who enjoys them as much as he did. All his games are in excellent condition, he took very good care of them. If he did play the games, no eating or drinking was allowed. Please feel free to ask any questions. Thank you!
